title: Restyle the homepage to match a Kavurey Hospital-like website design

requirements.text: Restyle the overall site visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) to resemble a modern hospital website similar to the Kavurey Hospital website, while keeping the existing pages and content structure intact.

quotes: CREATE THIS PAGE LOOK LIKE KAVUREY HOSPITAL WEBSITE LIKE

acceptanceCriteria: The site uses a cohesive hospital-style theme consistently across header, footer, and all pages (Home, About, Services, Emergency, Contact, Appointments).
No new user-facing features are added; this change is purely visual/theme/layout styling.
All pages remain readable with accessible contrast and consistent heading/body typography.

requirements.text: Update the global header and footer presentation to match the Kavurey Hospital-like styling (e.g., cleaner navigation styling, improved spacing, and more prominent primary call-to-action), while preserving existing navigation items and links.

quotes: CREATE THIS PAGE LOOK LIKE KAVUREY HOSPITAL WEBSITE LIKE

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links remain: Home, About, Services, Emergency, Contact, Appointments, and the existing 'Search on Google' link remains available on desktop and mobile.
Header remains sticky and responsive; mobile menu remains usable and visually aligned with the new theme.
Footer continues to show the current branding, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution link.

requirements.text: Redesign the Home page layout and section styling to look closer to the Kavurey Hospital website style (hero section, emergency highlight, service highlights, trust signals, and CTA), without removing existing sections or changing their meaning.

quotes: CREATE THIS PAGE LOOK LIKE KAVUREY HOSPITAL WEBSITE LIKE

acceptanceCriteria: Home page keeps the same major sections currently present (Hero, Emergency, Core Services, Trust Signals, CTA) but with updated layout/styling to match the requested reference style.
Existing CTAs still navigate to the same routes (/appointments, /services, /emergency, /contact) and the Google search opens in a new tab.
The hero image (/assets/generated/mahalaxmi-health-care-hero.dim_1600x700.png) remains displayed and looks integrated with the new design.

requirements.text: Adjust Tailwind theme tokens and global styles (e.g., in the CSS variables theme) as needed to support the new Kavurey Hospital-like palette and typography, ensuring consistent styling across light and dark modes (if dark mode remains enabled).

quotes: CREATE THIS PAGE LOOK LIKE KAVUREY HOSPITAL WEBSITE LIKE

acceptanceCriteria: Color tokens (primary/secondary/muted/accent/background) support the new theme consistently across pages and components.
No regressions in readability (text remains legible on backgrounds; buttons/links have clear states).
No changes are made to read-only/immutable UI component sources; styling is achieved via theme tokens, composition, and page/layout-level classes.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components must be composed, not edited).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep the backend canister behavior unchanged (no new backend requirements for this request).
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add new pages (e.g., Doctors) or new business features (e.g., payments, chat, maps).
Do not change existing form submission behavior for Contact or Appointment requests.
Do not change SEO logic, sitemap.xml, or robots.txt behavior as part of this styling request.
